pages.text: If you got a $(item)Dirt Block$() whenever you mined an ore, and it fell right into $(item)Lava$(), you'd have a whole lot of $(item)Dirt$().$(br2)No idea what you would do with that much $(item)Dirt$(). Maybe give it to a friend who has just arrived here and needs shelter on his first night?$(br)Anyway, the dropping stuff into $(item)Lava$() thing has to stop.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Puts broken blocks directly into your inventory instead of dropping them onto the ground.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools, Shears and $(item)Spectrum's Fishing Rods$().

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Inventory Insertion by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.
